headline: Rhodium Laser Cleaning
alternativeHeadline: Advanced Laser Ablation Techniques for Rhodium
description: Laser cleaning of rhodium utilizes short pulses from a fiber laser to selectively ablate surface contaminants. Rhodium's high reflectivity (~80% at 1064 nm) and thermal conductivity require precise fl...
